plot: A lonely construction worker gets surprised by the presence of a young child. This boy will then be his companion for the rest of the working day.
title: Un día de trabajo
plot_es: A lonely construction worker gets surprised by the presence of a young child. This boy will then be his companion for the rest of the working day.
plot_en: A lonely construction worker gets surprised by the presence of a young child. This boy will then be his companion for the rest of the working day.
